      • getChainFor

        public SegmentedArmature getChainFor(AbstractBone chainMember)
        Parameters:
        chainMember -
        Returns:
        returns the segment chain (pinned or unpinned, doesn't matter) to which the inputBone belongs.

      • getPinnedRootChainFromHere

        public SegmentedArmature getPinnedRootChainFromHere()
        this function travels rootward through the chain hierarchy until it reaches a chain whose base is pinned.
        Returns:
        returns the first chain encountered with a pinned base. Or, null if it reaches an unpinned armature root.
